ModMetaData.name: Sterile Expanded [1.3]
ModMetaData.author: ✬Rustic Fox✬
ModMetaData.description:
This mod add 2 medical furnitures and sterile walls.
All buildings are unlocked in the vanilla research tech sterile materials.
Sterile table and sterile lamp furnitures give slight medical bonuses on vanilla medical bed.
Sterile table have to be placed adjacent to a medical bed for bonuses.
Sterile lamp have to be placed near to a medical bed for bonuses.
Sterile walls are like the vanilla sterile floor with 0.6 clearness and additional 2 beauty.
All cost steel and silver.
It is balanced for vanilla and expand the medical options.
Original mod by: RayJayEyJay
